articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Strategic Rocket Force Command of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Strategic Rocket Force Command of KPA
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and people of the DPRK, inspected the Strategic Rocket Force Command of the KPA. 
					He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General Pak Jae Gyong, Ri Jae Il, first vice-department director of the Central Committee of the WPK and Hwang Pyong So, vice-department director of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					He was greeted by commanding officers of the command.
					
					After receiving a salute, he looked round the monument to the on-the-spot instructions of President Kim Il Sung and the monument to the field guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, conducted by commanding officers.
					
					He made the rounds of military targets, the room for the study of military affairs and military lecture rooms to acquaint himself with the unit's performance of duty, training and normal combat preparedness. 
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the unit has conducted dynamic trainings for firmly arming its service personnel with the WPK's Juche-oriented idea of military strategy and tactics and war methods after successfully building a room for study of military affairs and military lecture rooms meeting the need of a modern warfare and a drill ground for undergoing trainings under the simulated conditions of an actual battle. 
					
					He praised the unit for having in place apparatuses helpful to sufficiently giving education with the help of vivid visual aid, education combined with practice and education in actions and conducting effective trainings under the simulated conditions of a battle. 
					
					He told the service personnel of the unit to make thorough-going preparations for battles, aware that nothing is more important for the army whose mission is to protect the destiny of the country and the nation with arms than making preparations for battles, and reduce the citadel of the enemy to a sea in flames by merciless firing strikes if it goes into action.
					
					He went round an education room, bedroom and wash-cum-bath house of the company honored with the title of twice three-revolution red flag under the unit and its mess hall and daily provision store.
					
					He looked round the Unjong Health Complex built by the unit itself.
					
					He had pictures taken with the servants of the complex and the service personnel of the unit separately.
					
					He planted memorial trees together with service personnel of the unit.
					
					He planted Picea Koraiensis and Magnolia Kobushi which he had brought with him in the place where the monument to the on-the-spot instructions of Kim Il Sung and the monument to the field guidance of Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					He underlined the need for the KPA to plant and cultivate more trees around its units to turn the areas where they are stationed into pleasure grounds and recreation centers.

articles.title: Strongest Warning Served to Those Who Hurt Dignity of Supreme Leadership
articles.content:
Strongest Warning Served to Those Who Hurt Dignity of Supreme Leadership
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army released the following statement Friday:
					The war drills now under way by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and the U.S. imperialists have touched off towering grudge of the army and people of the DPRK and their pledge to make retaliation as they were deliberately perpetrated at a time when the Koreans are still in the mourning period.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group committed a thrice-cursed high treason without hesitation. The units of the puppet army openly slandered and defamed the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK after creating a touch-and-go situation.
					
					The internal affairs team of a puppet unit in Inchon carelessly hung portraits of the peerless great men born of Mt. Paektu on walls and doors, scrawling unspeakable defamatory words below them.
					
					This hysteric act can be committed only by the Lee group and it is a hideous provocation, pushing the situation to an uncontrollable phase.
					
					The group of traitors' campaign for defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK has reached a graver phase with each passing day.   Typical of the smear campaign were the case of "targeting DPRK flags" at units of the three services of the puppet army, slogans or placards hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK pasted at puppet army barracks and posts and military facilities and the case of "firing at the supreme leaders" of the DPRK that were perpetrated in firing ranges and drill grounds.
					
					The worst treason was committed against the nation grieving over the greatest loss.
					
					The gravity of the situation lies in that Lee Myung Bak masterminded the ideas and puppet Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin, chairman of the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff Jong Sung Jo spearheaded them as "state tasks".
					
					This hideous act of treachery aimed at escalating confrontation with the DPRK has drawn serious attention of the army and people of the DPRK, given that the dark clouds of a nuclear war is hanging heavily over the Korean Peninsula due to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills.
					
					Upon hearing the above-said news, the officers and men of the three services of the strong revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are anxiously waiting for an order, shouting "Destroy Myung Bak" and "Let's strike military warmongers". 
					
					Even south Korean public denounces the incidents as "reckless actions making people dreadful," "deliberate plots to incite confrontation with fellow countrymen" and "behavior of the insane to invite another war". 
					
					The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, reflecting mounting anger and revengeful thought of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK and south Korean people of different social standings, solemnly declares once again that it will indiscriminately stage its own-style sacred war to wipe out the group of traitors. 
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group is the sworn enemy with whom Koreans can never live under the same sky and the warmongers of the south Korean army are gang of traitors to be wiped out with arms. 
					
					The DPRK will continue its sacred war with main emphasis on physical attack till all acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK are brought to a definite end and Lee Myung Bak and military warmongers and other culprits are punished in the name of the nation and they make an apology before the nation for their high treason. 
					
					The army and people of the DPRK regard the dignity of the supreme leadership as dignity and honor common to the nation which is more valuable than their own lives. If anyone slightly insults and defames it, they will mercilessly wipe him out. 
					
					The history of the inter-Korean relations was complicated but there has never been such a period when extreme confrontation persisted and the nation has been threatened with such danger of a war as now due to the Lee group. 
					
					The group's evermore undisguised moves to escalate the confrontation remind one of a mad dog getting more ferocious before meeting its end. 
					
					The arms in the hands of all service personnel and people of the DPRK fully determined to take revenge upon the enemy will make a clean sweep of the group of traitors to the last man so that it can no longer hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and defame its dignified system.
					
					The world will see what a miserable end those wicked provocateurs will meet due to the merciless sacred war to be waged by all the service personnel and people to devotedly safeguard their leader and social system. 
					
					Those who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even a bit will find no breathing spell in this land and sky.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Raps War Hysteria of S. Korean Defense Minister
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Raps War Hysteria of S. Korean Defense Minister
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea on Thursday issued information bulletin No. 991 denouncing puppet Minister of Defense Kim Kwan Jin, a heinous confrontation element of south Korea, for fanning up the war hysteria at units of the puppet army.
					Recently touring the Command of the First Corps, the 18th Combat Air Division, the First Fleet of the Navy and other units of the puppet army under the pretext of "field examination of defense posture", Kim let loose coarse invectives that "the north is likely to provoke the south". He dared to decry the dignity and system of the DPRK.
					
					During the live shell firing drills in the areas of Paekryong and Yonphyong islands, he appeared at the commanding control room of the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff in which he cried out for immediate counteraction irrespective of reason, citing someone's "provocation".
					
					This is an intolerable insult and blatant challenge to the DPRK as it is an inveterate racket kicked up by the heinous confrontation element who is steeped in the enmity with the DPRK to the marrow of his bones, the information bulletin said.
					
					By nature, he is a pro-U.S. warmonger keen on racket for a war against the DPRK and confrontation with it. He is a despicable traitor who eulogized the moves of the U.S., his master, for a war of aggression against the DPRK and the confrontation policy of the south Korean authorities, it noted, and went on:
					
					The north-south relations have been plunged into complete deadlock and there created in the Korean Peninsula the touch-and-go situation in which a war may break out any time. Blame for this rests with traitor Lee Myung Bak, who took to sycophancy toward the U.S., stoked confrontation with fellow countrymen and escalated moves for a war against the DPRK as well as confrontation maniacs and war servants of foreign forces such as Kim Kwan Jin, a reckless warmonger following Lee.
					
					The group of traitors is kicking up the moves for a war against the DPRK while flinging mud at the fellow countrymen. But this is no more than the last-ditch efforts of the traitors at the deathbed who are frightened at the might of the DPRK's Songun and cursed and forsaken by the people's mindset for their acts of treachery.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon but punish traitor Lee Myung Bak and such confrontation maniacs as Kim Kwan Jin going on the rampage, not aware of how the world goes about.

articles.title: Premier Learns about Operation of Pyongyang Metro
articles.content:
Premier Learns about Operation of Pyongyang Metro
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim acquainted himself on the spot with the operation and management of Pyongyang Metro on Thursday.
					The Metro, a grand edifice of the era of the workers' party, has made a great contribution to the passengers' transportation in the city for nearly 40 years since its start of operation.
					
					Touring several places including metro stations and repairing bases, he learned about the issues arising in putting the operation of the metro on a normal footing and held a consultative meeting.
					
					Discussed there were measures for relevant units to sufficiently supply electric cars and facilities, raw materials and others necessary for mending the facilities and modernizing the repairing bases.

articles.title: Towering Grudge of DPRK's Army and People against Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Towering Grudge of DPRK's Army and People against Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army that those who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even a bit will find no breathing spell in this land and sky, all the service personnel and people of the DPRK are fully determined to make a retaliatory strike to wipe them out.
					The high treason committed by traitor Lee Myung Bak and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet military against the nation grieving over the greatest loss touched off towering resentment of all Koreans of different social standings. Voices that "they are unimaginable things done by mad dogs" and "let's mercilessly beat Myung Bak and military warmongers to death" are growing stronger hour by hour.
					
					Kye Chol Un, an officer of the KPA, said: It is not a time to say any longer. Now is the time to show the mettle of the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and real taste of war. The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should not calculate they can survive anywhere.
					
					If Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un issues an order, the match-for-a hundred soldiers who have grown to be the matchless army under the care of the commanders of Mt. Paektu will mercilessly strike traitor Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin, Jong Sung Jo and others.
					
					Choe Il Ryong, vice-minister of Light Industry, noted: The dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is the life and soul of the army and people of the DPRK and the dignity and honor common to the nation. Such hooliganism as carelessly hanging portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and scrawling unspeakable defamatory words below them is the hideous crimes. This put all evil acts committed by the successive puppet cliques into the shade. Now that the Lee group committed the thrice-cursed provocation, the army and people of the DPRK will force the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to pay a thousand-fold price for its crimes without fail.
					
					Ji Jong Ho, head of a UHP electric arc furnace of the Chollima Steel Complex, stated: What the Lee group did makes our blood run cold and it is shuddering. Hysteric racket of the group has reached an uncontrollable phase. Mad dog should be beaten to death with a stick. We will throw traitor Lee and warmongers of the puppet military into a melting furnace in the name of the working class of the DPRK.
					
					Kim Yong Bok, chairperson of the Management Board of the Mangyongdae Vegetable Farm, said: Absolutely unpardonable are the evil acts perpetrated by the bandit of gangsters bereft of elementary etiquette and morality as human beings as they were deliberately committed at a time when the Koreans are still in the mourning period. We do not want a war but are never afraid of it. We will never pardon the group of traitors going reckless.
					
					Kim Myong Jin, a researcher of the Biological Engineering Branch under the State Academy of Sciences, noted: The Lee group of traitors does not yet know about the army and people of the DPRK. They value the dignity of the party and the leader more than their own lives. It is their faith and will to wipe out the enemy without mercy if it insults and hurts the dignity even a bit. The world will see what a miserable end those wicked provocateurs will meet due to the merciless sacred war to be waged by all the service personnel and people to devotedly safeguard their leader and social system. The high treason of the Lee group of traitors is touching off towering resentment of the members of the young vanguard.
					
					Pak Kyong Il, a soldier-turned-student of Kim Il Sung University, pointed out: If the supreme commander issues an order, we will replace our pens by arms and rush to the forefront to fight a just war for mercilessly punishing the puppet group. We will blow up the bases where the units of the puppet army are stationed in retaliation against their acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					Jon Kum Phyong, a student of Pyongyang Songuja Secondary School, said: I intended to join a university after graduating from the secondary school. But I volunteer to join the People's Army at this time when the heinous enemy of the nation and warmongers such as traitor Lee Myung Bak are threatening our future and happiness. My life and hope can be guaranteed only when the dignity of our supreme leadership is protected. I will not hesitate to devote my life to protecting it.
					
					The hearts of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK are burning with the towering resentment at the Lee group which committed reckless acts to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. They are on maximum alert and waiting for the historic moment to arrive when they will force the group to pay for all its crimes.

articles.title: DPRK People Resolved to Take Revenge on S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
DPRK People Resolved to Take Revenge on S. Korean Regime
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the Friday statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, the people of the DPRK are hardening their resolve to take merciless revenge upon south Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime that defamed the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.

articles.title: April 25 Sports Team Proves Successful in National Tournament
articles.content:
April 25 Sports Team Proves Successful in National Tournament
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The sports contest for Paektusan Prize closed in the DPRK.
					The April 25 Sports Team came first in men's and women's basketball events of this year's first tournament.
					
					In the contest the Amnokgang Sports Team finished second in those events while boys of the Sobaeksu Sports Team and girls of the Kigwancha Sports Team placed third. 
					
					Taking part in this basketball tournament were first-class men and women teams of the country.
					
					The tournament was held by way of league matches to decide ranking and then matches between each two teams at the order of their placing.

articles.title: Tree-Planting Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Tree-Planting Day Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in various parts of the DPRK on Friday, the Tree-Planting Day, to vow to make dynamic efforts for the afforestation of the whole country.
					President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk climbed up Moran Hill on March 2, 1946 and called for beautifully embellishing the mountains of the country.
					
					This day became the Tree-Planting Day in the DPRK.
					
					Present at the meetings were Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam and other senior officials and officials of the party, power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions and working people of various circles and school youths and students.
					
					Reports and speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					At the end of the meetings they planted trees at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site, the April 15 Children's Flower Garden, the arboretum of the Central Botanical Garden and the Mansudae area construction site.
					
					On the same day officials of the Ministry of Railways, officials, working people and students in various provinces, cities and counties planted trees after holding meetings.

articles.title: Tree-planting Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Tree-planting Day Observed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- All the people in the DPRK turned out in tree-planting campaign on March 2, the Tree-planting Day.
					Seen in various parts of Pyongyang including Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site, April 15 Children's Flower Garden and Moran Hill were people and planting and watering trees.
					
					The government made a detailed survey of the actual situation of afforestation throughout the country before the spring tree-planting campaign. On this basis it set a workable plan and gave precedence to ensuring conditions and technical guidance for afforestation. 
					
					The nurseries in the capital city and provinces of the country have grown good species of saplings in a larger quantity while taking steps to raise the rate of rooting by rational method.
					
					In recent years a tree-planting campaign has been conducted throughout the country, making big strides in afforestation.
					
					On March 2, Juche 35 (1946) President Kim Il Sung, together with Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, climbed Moran Hill in Pyongyang and called for turning the country into a picturesque land covered with green foliage.

articles.title: Wild Onion, Good for Health
articles.content:
Wild Onion, Good for Health
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Wild onion, one of perennial plants, can be easily gathered from mountains, hills and fields in Korea in early spring.
					From olden times, the Korean people have liked to take wild onion as it contains various kinds of vitamins, protein, sugar and minerals.
					
					In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Prof. and Dr. Kim Jong Gil at the Academy of Koryo Medicine.
					
					He said:
					
					With sweat and spicy tastes and peculiar odor, wild onion improves appetite, while giving good effect on avitaminosis people are liable to suffer in early spring.
					
					It also helps remedy women's diseases and energize men.
					
					The traditional Korean medicine discovered that wild onion invigorates the function of spleen and kidney, prevents anemin, increases vigor and strength, inhibits growth of cancer cells and relieves engorgement.
					
					With much kalium, wild onion is especially good for those with geriatric disease.

articles.title: KCNA Denounces Rowdyism of Those Guilty
articles.content:
KCNA Denounces Rowdyism of Those Guilty
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is going busy every day with anti-DPRK smear campaign, talking about the issue of "defectors from the north."
					Involved in the burlesque now going on under the slogan "No forcible deportation of the north's defectors arrested by Chinese police" are traitor Lee Myung Bak, conservative group of the "Saenuri Party", right-wing organizations and bribed human scum.
					
					It is not difficult to guess what is behind this charade as they pursue the same aims through unethical crimes.
					
					The true nature of the smear campaign can be evidenced by the fact that this campaign was joined in by reptile Chosun Ilbo and Daily NK which again let loose a spate of invectives against the north such as a "lecture for propaganda about the social system" and "creation of horror" over the issue of "deportation of defectors to the north" on February 29.
					
					The row kicked up by the Lee group "to protest the deportation" is no more than another frantic campaign against the DPRK to hurt the high dignity and impair the international prestige of the DPRK and a foolish chicanery to cover up the truth about its unethical acts.
					
					Since he came to power Lee has committed only crimes not only in the issue of national reconciliation and unity and the issue of reunification but also in solving humanistic issue including reunions of separated families and relatives.
					
					The group paid a lot of money to brokers in areas along the border of the DPRK and in the third country to conduct operations to allure and abduct inhabitants of the DPRK in groups.
					
					Not content with this, the group disclosed its ulterior intention to intensify those operations recently, talking about "increase of funds for non-governmental level reunions through the third country and exchange".
					
					The plan of the group of traitors to dramatically escalate the above-said operations has been put on the verge of frustration from their very start. Moreover, the truth about the disturbances created by the group not only among Koreans but in the stability of the countries concerned is likely to be laid bare.
					
					As they have committed only indelible crimes through suppression and misrule, the traitors are suffering from a nightmare, much uneasy and afraid of the full disclosure of the inside stories about their crimes.
					
					With nothing can the Lee group downplay or hide its wrong doings. Only a severe judgment by history and the nation awaits it. Traitors to the nation and those who committed crimes against ethics as hirelings of Lee are no exception.
					
					Chosun Ilbo and Daily NK engrossed in false propaganda as buglers of the Lee group more dead than alive would be well advised to clearly know their miserable position.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Feats of Kim Jong Il in Defending Socialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Feats of Kim Jong Il in Defending Socialism
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates a bylined article to the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable".
					Kim Jong Il decisively smashed all sorts of sophisms of the imperialists and reactionaries about socialism and proved the justice and inevitability of victory of socialism with irrefutable logic, the article says, and goes on:
					
					Kim Jong Il's feats in defending socialism find an expression in the facts that he clearly indicated the road to the victory of socialism with his outstanding ideas and theories and made sure that the advantages of Korean-style socialism were fully demonstrated in the practical struggle for revolution and construction.
					
					He formulated the revolutionary idea, the Juche idea of President Kim Il Sung as the guiding idea of the present era through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities in his early years.
					
					Kim Jong Il saw to it that the Songun idea was held fast to as an ever-victorious treasured sword in the present era as required by the developing revolution.
					
					He enunciated ideas and theories on firmly arming the popular masses with socialist idea, strictly adhering to the socialist principles and preserving the nature of socialism in all fabrics of social life. All other ideas and theories propounded by him are run through with the aims to defend and glorify socialism. 
					
					He fully disclosed the hypocrisy and reactionary nature of the imperialists' false propaganda that socialism is "totalitarian", "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding" with his perfect logic and proved the validity of the socialist cause and the inevitability of its victory. 
					
					He put forward the popular masses as a base of socialism and made everything serve the people. He solved all the problems arising in the revolution and construction by enlisting creative enthusiasm of the popular masses. 
					
					Socialism in the DPRK is now demonstrating its great vitality. It is the true picture of the Korean people that they are meeting the requirements of Juche in ideology, technology and culture without the slightest deviation from the collectivist principle, socialist principle.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Ultimate Goal of S. Korean Authorities' Policy of Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Ultimate Goal of S. Korean Authorities' Policy of Confrontation
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- It is natural that frequent clouds bring rain. The south Korean authorities' persistent confrontation moves may lead to a war against the DPRK any moment. 
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					Noting that the on-going joint military exercises in south Korea against the DPRK fully reflect the south Korean authorities' policy of confrontation against reunification, the article goes on:
					
					The above-said policy of the Lee Myung Bak "government" is run through with moves to do harm to the DPRK and stifle it.
					
					It is the ulterior intention of the group to realize its foolish dream of "unification of social systems" by bringing down the dignified system of the DPRK. 
					
					Lurking behind these ceaseless exercises for a war against the DPRK in south Korea is such sinister aim. 
					
					The on-going saber-rattling is the worst provocation as it is rubbing salt into the wounds of the fellow countrymen in the north still grieving over the demise of the father of the nation. 
					
					No one can imagine what serious situation the Lee group will create as it is bereft of any elementary human reason, ethics and morality, hell-bent on the moves to ignite a war against the DPRK. 
					
					Its anti-DPRK confrontation policy is, in fact, the source of evils which would bring a nuclear war disaster to the Korean nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Uninterrupted Struggle for Independence and Justice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Uninterrupted Struggle for Independence and Justice
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The progressive countries of the world are required to wage an uninterrupted dynamic struggle for independence and justice, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					The article cites facts to prove that peace and stability are threatened and disturbed in various countries and the principles of justice and impartiality violated in the international relations due to the U.S. reckless high-handed military actions and hegemonic moves. 
					
					The imperialists are blocking the advance of the people toward independence and justice under the signboard of "freedom and democracy", the article says, adding:
					
					Taken in by "freedom and democracy" touted by the imperialists, Iraq and not a few other countries are suffering from serious social chaos and disorder.
					
					It is another wicked method employed by the imperialists to intensify aggression and plunder by using the method of replacing by force of arms the governments not obedient to them.
					
					All the progressive people that love independence and justice should turn out in a positive struggle for foiling the imperialists' crafty and wicked moves for aggression and plunder.
					
					It is necessary to bolster the military muscle now that the imperialists work hard to infringe upon the sovereignty of other countries, bring down their governments and plunder them of their resources by force of arms. 
					
					If the progressive countries bravely stand up against the imperialists' moves with strong military capabilities for self-defence, every country can ensure its sovereignty and emerge victorious in the cause of independence and justice.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Lee Myung Bak was reported to have blustered that "an urgent task for increasing war capability is to make defence reforms," asserting that "the north is steadily beefing up its military muscle." Trumpeting about "security", he cried out for making "preparations to beat the enemy", "reinforcing the will to retaliate against provocation" and "getting fully ready to do so."
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					The  accusations made by Lee against the DPRK, ballyhooing about "the north's beefing up of its military muscle" is nothing but gangster-like sophism to evade the responsibility for having escalated tension and bedeviled the north-south relations and justify the moves to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					What Lee cried out for "punishment" and the like, touting "security" only strips bare his ulterior motive and bellicose nature, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					It was ridiculous, indeed, for the traitor to have mouthed "security". The puppet forces are the arch criminals who have rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense. Finding itself in the worst ruling crisis, the Lee group is keen to fan up bitterness towards compatriots and divert elsewhere the public attention with "security" rhetoric, but this trite artifice will never work. 
					
					"Punishment" which Lee cried out for before his minions glaringly proves that he is none other than the worst warmonger who is egging the puppet brass hats onto inter-Korean confrontation and a war against the north.
					
					It is the final conclusion drawn by the DPRK that it is left with no option but to finally settle accounts with Lee steeped in extreme bitterness towards compatriots and confrontation hysteria to the marrow of his bones.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Search of Chongryon Facilities
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Search of Chongryon Facilities
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Japan's public security authorities ransacked offices of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan and the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan inside the Korean Publishing Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). They also searched a travel company providing convenience to the Koreans in Japan for their visits to the homeland and the Itabashi Branch of Tokyo Metropolis of Chongryon. Huge armed police were mobilized for the operations that were carried out amid terror-ridden atmosphere on February 28.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					As was the case with the past incidents, the latest crackdown was unlawful violation aimed to harm the dignity of the DPRK and disband Chongryon.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries have cooked up conspiratorial cases to obliterate Chongryon ever since the organization came into existence. But never has there been such a childish and sordid case as the recent one.
					
					This is a clear reminder of the Japanese right-wing reactionaries' enmity and fascist frenzy against the DPRK and Chongryon. Japan revealed in international eyes its nature as a rogue state and the world's worst human rights abuser where militarism revives and national chauvinism stalks.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries' moves against the DPRK and Chongryon were committed in parallel with the U.S. and south Korean puppet group's confrontation campaign against the DPRK. Herein lies the gravity of the incident.
					
					No matter how desperately the Japanese reactionaries may try, they can never bring down the DPRK and Chongryon, which make steady victorious progress under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: U.S. 7th Fleet to Enter S. Korean Port
articles.content:
U.S. 7th Fleet to Enter S. Korean Port
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- "Blue Ridge", flag ship of the U.S. 7th Fleet, is to enter a south Korean port at a time when madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are under way in the sky and land and in seas to invade the DPRK.
					The Command of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea on Feb. 29 announced that "Blue Ridge" will enter a port of Tonghae City of south Korean Kangwon Province on March 2.
					
					Public opinions are unanimous in commenting that its portcall is aimed to participate in the said joint military exercises.
					
					This landing operation commanding warship is capable of commanding naval operations and controlling forces frequently entered south Korea in the past for the purpose of staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle and other war maneuvers against the DPRK, taking the lead in driving the situation to the brink of war.
					
					The U.S. imperialists are describing the movement of the warship as "a regular one" and the like in a bid to conceal the truth but with no rhetoric can they cover up their bellicose intention to fan up the fever to invade the north.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean Anti-DPRK War Moves Condemned
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean Anti-DPRK War Moves Condemned
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia issued a statement titled "The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers should immediately stop Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills" on Feb. 29.
					The statement denounced the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for launching the joint military drills against the north with more than 200 000 troops and many latest war hardware involved, defying domestic and foreign public condemnation and protest. 
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group claims that the military drills are to cope with "possible provocation" from someone and they are "annual exercises for defense", but this is no more than sophism, it said, adding:
					
					The joint military drills clearly prove once again the sinister intention of the Lee group to ignite a war against the north at any cost in collusion with the U.S. and to do harm to the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					The mourning period is not yet over in the DPRK but the warmongers kicked off the large-scale joint military drills. The Lee group is made up of hooligans bereft of elementary morality and conscience.
					
					The group is seeking to find a way out of the crisis in the large-scale joint military drills and divert elsewhere public criticism with the elections approaching.
					
					But no one will be taken in by it.
					
					The statement urged the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to stop at once the war moves against the DPRK, not going reckless.

articles.title: Servicepersons of DPRK Determined to Destroy Lee Myung Bak Regime of S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Determined to Destroy Lee Myung Bak Regime of S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army Friday released a statement to condemn the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea for again defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					Now men and officers of the KPA are enraged at the regime's high treason.
					
					An officer, Kim Hung Ryong, told KCNA:
					
					"The statement said that those who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even a bit would find no breathing spell in this land and sky. This declaration is fully supported by the servicepersons. 
					
					Not content with the anti-DPRK war drills, a unit of the south Korean puppet army carelessly hung portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on walls and doors, scrawling unspeakable defamatory words below them.
					
					This fact goes to prove that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is the sworn enemy with whom we can never live under the same sky.
					
					All of our servicepersons are hardening their resolve to make a clean sweep of the group of traitors to the last man. Action is needed rather than warning. Our unit is anxiously waiting for an order."
					
					An officer, Ryu Su Hyang, said:
					
					"The anti-DPRK acts done by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are wrecking peace. They are tantamount to a declaration of war. With a war declared, I think there will be an order to advance southward.
					
					Once the order is given, we will kill traitor Lee and his followers, the military hawks, in the name of the entire Korean nation."
					
					An officer, Kim Myong Chan, said:
					
					"Traitor Lee Myung Bak, Defence Minister Kim Kwan Jin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Jong Sung Jo of south Korea invented a hideous provocation and adopted it as 'state task'.
					
					We have to punish this group of traitors at any cost or history will never forgive our generation.
					
					We will never accept any apology of the internal affairs team of an Inchon-based puppet army unit which committed the afore-said crime."

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Accuses Authorities of Pushing for Navy Base Construction
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Accuses Authorities of Pushing for Navy Base Construction
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The measure council for checking the construction of Jeju naval base in south Korea condemned the "government" authorities for pressing for the construction. The organization held a press conference on February 29.
					Recalling the stand clarified by the "Prime Minister's office" to push forward the construction, the speakers said the office cites the protection of the waters off the southern area as a reason for the construction but clear is the authorities' stand to bring U.S. warships to the area, given the U.S. dispatch of its naval forces to the area.
					
					This has brought to light the hypocrisy of the earlier claim by the authorities that it would be possible for civilian ships to use the base.
					
					The violent suppression of people opposing the base construction linking them with the north is a mockery of the people, they said.
					
					They vowed not to stop fighting even though they may be arrested while fighting for Jeju Island.
					
					They urged the authorities to immediately stop the construction.
					
					At the end of the conference the organization thrust a written protest to the "Prime Minister's office".

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities′ Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign under Fire
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Friday released information bulletin No. 992 slamming the south Korean authorities for getting frantic with the anti-DPRK smear campaign over its just condemnation of their crimes against the nation and reunification.
					Ryu U Ik, puppet minister of Unification, let loose a stream of such nonsense as "the north's mud-slinging at the south got markedly intensified", "the north's mud-slinging is violation of the basic agreement between the south and the north" and "it is not helpful to the development of the south-north relations," the bulletin said, and continued:
					
					This is nothing but clumsy and ridiculous excuses of the group of traitors much upset by the full disclosure of its true colors as the most hideous confrontation maniacs and the main culprit of the collapse of the inter-Korean relations in face of the DPRK's just assertions and undeniable evidence.
					
					The Lee group had better reflect on the crimes it has committed against the nation and reunification before talking about someone's "slander."
					
					It was only the Lee group which made no scruple of committing such unethical act as rubbing salt into the wounds of the fellow countrymen, crying out for "dealing with the north's leadership and its people separately" at a time when all the Koreans and the whole world were stricken with the bitter sorrow over the passing of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					The puppet warmongers launched Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills in collusion with the U.S. imperialists in the mourning period. This is touching off towering wrath and resentment of the army and people of the DPRK as it is thrice-cursed high treason committed against the fellow countrymen in profound grief.
					
					How can the DPRK show good faith to such group which is leveling guns at compatriots, discarding even elementary etiquette as human beings, to say nothing of the consciousness as compatriots?
					
					Whoever has sound reason will clearly realize without any explanation why the inter-Korean relations were brought to such catastrophic phase though they had developed into reconciliation, unity and reunification and who on earth is to blame for such tragic situation.
					
					The group's noisy anti-DPRK smear campaign is nothing but its last-ditch efforts to calm down the south Koreans' protest and condemnation of it and divert public attention elsewhere in a bid to evade the blame for having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations and turn the situation in the election in its favor and thus get rid of the predicament.
					
					With neither anti-DPRK smear campaign nor desperate efforts can the group escape a stern judgment by history.

articles.title: KBS Enters into Indefinite Boycott of Program Production
articles.content:
KBS Enters into Indefinite Boycott of Program Production
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The KBS Media Persons' Association of south Korea on March 2 entered into an indefinite boycott of program production in protest against the puppet authorities' moves to put media under their control, CBS of south Korea reported.
					It deplored that fair reporting has been put into a serious crisis since Lee Myung Bak appointed conservative Kim In Gyu as chairman of the KBS.
					
					The organization made it clear that it launched an action demanding a stop to the unfair reporting aimed at misleading public opinion and the resignation of the chairman.
					
					The KBS Trade Union is also going to launch an overall general strike on March 6.
					
					Unionists of the media organizations of south Korea are persisting in their actions against the desperate moves of the puppet regime to put media under its control and its suppression of media.
					
					Actions of reporters and anchor persons belonging to the Reporters Association and the Video Cameramen's Association of the MBC to totally boycott program production and the MBC Trade Union's general strike demanding the resignation of Kim Jae Chol, the wicked chairman of the MBC, are going on. They are positively joined by trade unions of various media organizations.
					
					South Korean progressive media persons are intensifying their actions day by day, saying that they can no longer tolerate the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to put the broadcasting service under its control and allow the government to supervise its activities in a bid to stay in power.

articles.title: Spring of February Is Eternal: Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
Spring of February Is Eternal: Korean in U.S.
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Ro Kil Nam, representative of Minjok Thongsin, posted an article on the paper under the title of "Spring of February Is Eternal" on Feb. 24.
					Minjok Thongsin is an internet paper of Koreans in the United States.
					
					Ro Kil Nam took part in major celebrations for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, as a member of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S.
					
					The article referred to the significant commemoration of the day as the most auspicious holiday.
					
					It went on to say:
					
					After visiting snowy Pyongyang in last December when it was mourning over the great loss to the nation, I again visited Pyongyang on the first Day of the Shining Star.
					
					In fact, I felt sort of depressed at that time. The sky over Pyongyang looked gloomy as if the sun stopped giving out rays following the passing of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il. But the sun of Songun Korea remained. 
					
					The sun of Mt. Paektu keeps shining and its history is given steady continuity.
					
					The compatriots in the DPRK sang of the hymn of February ardently longing for the father of the nation and brought into full bloom Kimjongilia, the flower of the sun, throughout the country revering the peerlessly great men. 
					
					Fireworks were displayed to commemorate the February holiday in the sky over the Jongil Peak in praise of the immortal exploits of the son of guerrillas.
					
					Delegations of overseas compatriots took part in colorful commemorations, reminiscing about him. Progressive foreign friends visited Pyongyang to pay their respects to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Witnessing the solemn and strong yearnings for him, I cherished the truth again that the spring of February is eternal.
					
					Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un is the brilliant sun that glorifies the spring of February shining with the spirit of Mt. Paektu as the permanent spring of the great national fortune.
					
					He is identical to the great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					He embraced service persons and people during his field guidance and even during the mourning period he took warm care of them and showed benevolence for overseas compatriots. I could feel his kind-heartedness time and again.
					
					In fact, the spring of February is eternal.
					
					The article said major media of the world gave wide publicity to the greatness of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Prevailing in the DPRK is the idea of believing in people as in Heaven, the article said, adding:
					
					Enjoying the absolute trust from the people, Kim Jong Un adds shine to the spring of February with his ardent love for the country, the nation and the people which were shown by the great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					This is the unanimous opinion of all overseas Koreans.
					
					All the stories telling about Kim Jong Un at home and abroad had commonality. 
					
					A lot of people said "KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un took into careful consideration what people thought and did work favored by the people just like NDC Chairman Kim Jong Il…"
					
					The compatriots in the DPRK, rallied behind Kim Jong Un, steadily advance the cause of February without any hesitation and vacillation overcoming the pain at the great loss.
					
					Yearning for Kim Jong Il, they convert their sorrow into strength and courage and pledge loyalty to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					They are convinced that as long as they have Kim Jong Un, the great sun of the nation, Songun Korea will shine forever as a country of the sun and all the Koreans will live in a flower garden.
					
					I believe it because they do not make empty words. 
					
					Looking at them, I think the spring of February is eternal as long as they have Kim Jong Un, identical to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for DPRK National Defence Commission Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for DPRK National Defence Commission Supported by British Organizations
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche idea expressed full support for the statement of a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					The organizations in a joint statement on Feb. 25 said that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are, in fact, a test nuclear war and a replica of the Team Spirit joint military exercises which had been suspended in the past in face of strong public condemnation at home and abroad. 
					
					Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are aimed at violating the sovereignty of the DPRK and destroying the socialist system centred on the popular masses as they are for invading it, the statement noted.
					
					It is the legitimate and sovereign right of the DPRK to wage a sacred war to frustrate such military exercises, wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and reunify the country, it stressed.
					
					The U.S. imperialists and their followers should realize that the "Libyan style solution" will never work on the DPRK in which all the people are united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un single-mindedly, it said.
					
					It demanded a halt to the joint military exercises and urged the U.S. forces to pull back from south Korea.

articles.title: British Organizations Term "Nuclear Security Summit" Charade
articles.content:
British Organizations Term "Nuclear Security Summit" Charade
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a joint statement on Feb. 24 as regards the "nuclear security summit" to be opened by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities in Seoul late in March.
					It is illogical to discuss "nuclear security" in south Korea, a nuclear outpost of the U.S. and the world's biggest nuclear arsenal, the statement said.
					
					The U.S. is the world's biggest possessor of nuclear weapons and it is the only country which used atomic bombs in practice, it noted.
					
					For south Korea to host the "nuclear security summit" is evidently a provocation to the DPRK and part of the moves of the U.S. imperialists, south Korean puppet group and their imperialist allies to jointly pressurize the DPRK to disarm it, it pointed out, adding it is also a foolish move of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group to destroy Korean-style socialism centred on the popular masses in league with the world reactionary forces.
					
					The "nuclear security summit" to take place, timed to coincide with the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises for aggression is nothing but another threat and blackmail against the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					We call upon the world progressive forces to disclose the sinister aims of the "nuclear security summit" and vehemently condemn it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work off Press in Russia
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Khabarovskaya Krayevaya Tipografia Publishing House of Russia published in booklet leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism" to mark the Day of the Shining Star.
					The work, published in February Juche 91 (2002), clarified such issues as the origin and essence of nationalism, view of nationalism in the past and an important issue arising in achieving the independent development of the nation.

articles.title: Kuwaiti Organizations on Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Kuwaiti Organizations on Kim Jong Il's Feats
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti preparatory committee for commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association issued a joint bulletin on Feb. 15.
					The bulletin carried a portrait of the smiling leader and articles.
					
					The bulletin said in an article titled "HE Great Kim Jong Il will be always alive" that it is the firm pledge of the army and people of DPRK to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever and not to make any slightest concession or vacillation in the efforts to accomplish the cause of Juche, the cause of Songun, remaining true to his instructions.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un is now standing at the helm of the Korean revolution, the bulletin said, adding that no force on earth can block the Korean people advancing under his wise leadership.
					
					The bulletin said in an article titled "Ideas and feats of HE great Kim Jong Il will be immortal" that there are in the DPRK a solid political and military foundation for successfully advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation and a strong groundwork for the eternal prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					Kim Jong Un is an outstanding thinker and theoretician and peerless commander of Songun leading the revolution and construction along the road of steady victories with the same idea and leadership method as Kim Jong Il's.
					
					The immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il will always remain shining in history thanks to Kim Jong Un, the bulletin stressed.

articles.title: Juche Idea Indicates Road of Human Cause of Independence: Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Juche Idea Indicates Road of Human Cause of Independence: Mexican Organization
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released its bulletin No. 67 under the title "Human cause of independence and Juche idea".
					The Juche idea indicates the road ahead of the human cause of independence, the bulletin said, adding the idea gives perfect answers to all matters including the target and tasks for realizing independence of the popular masses and the principle and ways for implementing them.
					
					Progressive mankind is admitting the truth of the Juche idea through the reality of the DPRK, it noted, went on:
					
					Under the banner of the Juche idea the Korean people won victory in the wars against two imperialisms, successfully carried out the social revolution of two stages and built a victorious socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					The DPRK has firmly defended socialism and steadily brought about world-startling miraculous events in building a thriving nation despite the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialist allied forces. This is greatly encouraging progressive mankind aspiring after independence.
					
					The human cause of independence will in the future, too, dynamically advance, overcoming all challenges and difficulties of history under the banner of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Peru
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Peru
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened in Peru on Feb. 22 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Displayed at its venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their feats, books and photos on Songun-based Korea and handicrafts associated with the creative wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					Jose Luis Perez Aleman, deputy governor of a district of Santiago, Lima City of Peru said that he deemed it an honor to hold the Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition to mark the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The exhibition will offer Peruvians an opportunity to know better about the DPRK and the Korean people, he noted, expressing hope that the exchange, cooperation and bonds of friendship between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields.
					
					He expressed support for the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					Meanwhile, a photo exhibition took place in Dominica on Feb. 20.

articles.title: China Slams Japan for Conducting Unilateral Survey in Disputed Waters
articles.content:
China Slams Japan for Conducting Unilateral Survey in Disputed Waters
Beijing, March 1 (KCNA) -- Hong Lei, spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Ministry, at a news conference on Feb. 29, denounced Japan for making an unilateral survey in the waters of the East Sea of China.
					He said that China expresses dissatisfaction with Japan's repeated unilateral survey in the disputed waters despite its opposition.
					
					Noting that China's attitude toward the issue of the East Sea is clear and consistent, he urged Japan to immediately stop such an act and refrain from violations of the rights and interests of China.

articles.title: Russian PM Accuses U.S. of Politicizing Human Rights Issue
articles.content:
Russian PM Accuses U.S. of Politicizing Human Rights Issue
Moscow, March 1 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin in an article contributed to a paper on Feb. 27 accused the U.S. of trying to politicize the human rights issue.
					The U.S. and some other countries are working hard to hold sway over the issue of defending human rights, totally politicize it and use it as a means of pressuring others, the article said.
					
					These countries let loose non-objective and prejudiced remarks of provocative nature beyond imagination to blame Russia, while not tolerating accusations against them, it added.

articles.title: Russian PM Opposes Arbitrariness on Int'l Arena
articles.content:
Russian PM Opposes Arbitrariness on Int'l Arena
Moscow, March 1 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin in an article contributed to the paper Moskovskiye Novosti on Feb. 27 expressed the stand opposing arbitrariness on the international arena. 
					No one has the right to play the role of the UN or make the UN's mandate his own regarding the issues related to the use of force against sovereign countries, the article said.
					
					NATO is trying to play the function ill-matched to its nature of "defense-oriented alliance". Still unforgettable is the futile appeal for legal provisions and elementary human ethics made by those states that fell victim to "export of democracy by use of missiles and bombs", it said. 
					
					Americans are obsessed with the dream-like idea to hold the absolute position no one can provoke, it added.

articles.title: Cuba Defends Palestinian Self-determination in Kuds
articles.content:
Cuba Defends Palestinian Self-determination in Kuds
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Cuba's Ambassador to Qatar, Armando Vergara, defended the right of the Palestinian people to self-determination and to establish an independent state with its capital in east Kuds, harassed again by Israel at an international meeting on Feb. 28.
					Sources from the Cuban embassy in Doha highlighted the diplomat's intervention in the international conference in defense of the holy city.
					
					East Kuds is an inseparable part of the occupied Palestinian State, he noted. 
					
					He said that Cuba supports without hesitation the steps taken in the UN General Assembly to achieve the proclamation of the Palestinian State as a full member.

articles.title: Iran Warns Aggressors of Crushing Blows
articles.content:
Iran Warns Aggressors of Crushing Blows
Tehran, March 1 (KCNA) -- The minister of Defence and Armed Forces Logistics of Iran in a press conference on Feb. 27 warned Israel and the West of their military threat to his country.
					Iran will bravely stand against the threat of Israel and the West, he said, adding that the strategy of his country is to strongly react against any aggression of the enemy with deadly strikes.
					
					If the enemy attacks Iran, it will certainly regret for this, he declared.

articles.title: U.S. and West Accused of Imposing Sanctions on Iran's Shipping Organization
articles.content:
U.S. and West Accused of Imposing Sanctions on Iran's Shipping Organization
Tehran, March 1 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Shipping Organization of Iran on Feb. 27 accused the United States and other Western countries of imposing sanctions on the organization. 
					Refuting the allegation that the organization had been involved in illegal activities, he said that the organization conducts all activities consistent with the norms of the international maritime transportation and respects the relevant international conventions.
					
					The U.S. and other Western countries failed to present any evidence proving the organization's alleged illegal activities, he noted, saying it will continue its work in a world scale in defiance of their moves.

articles.title: Economic Depression in Japan and Ireland
articles.content:
Economic Depression in Japan and Ireland
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Struggling Japanese semiconductor maker Elpida Memory Inc. said Monday it has filed with the Tokyo District Court for bankruptcy protection under the corporate rehabilitation law, giving up on efforts to rebuild after receiving government support.
					Meanwhile, the volume of retail sales in Ireland fell by 3.7 percent in January compared with December 2011, according to figures released by the Central Statistics Office (CSO) on Tuesday.
					
					Some economists attributed this to the declining purchasing power of people.

articles.title: Occupy Protesters Evicted from London Site
articles.content:
Occupy Protesters Evicted from London Site
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Riot police evicted anti-capitalist protesters and removed their tents from the courtyard of St Paul's Cathedral in London on Tuesday.
					Several arrests were made by the police during the eviction.
					
					The Occupy London camp at St Paul's Cathedral, which campaigns against corporate greed, was set up last year in October.

articles.title: Alert in Eastern Indian State Bihar on Avian Influenza
articles.content:
Alert in Eastern Indian State Bihar on Avian Influenza
New Delhi, March 1 (KCNA) -- The eastern Indian state Bihar has sounded an alert against possible spread of avian influenza after a large number of crows died in the state from bird flu, officials said Monday.
					Hundreds of crows have died in Bihar in the last one and a half months, said the Health Ministry.
					
					Urgent measures were taken to prevent the spread of the disease.

articles.title: AIDS Spreads in Japan
articles.content:
AIDS Spreads in Japan
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare of Japan, quoting its survey data, said on Feb. 24 that 1 019 more have been registered as infected with the AIDS virus with the number of AIDS patients reaching 467.

articles.title: Asian Countries Cooperate
articles.content:
Asian Countries Cooperate
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The prime ministers of Vietnam and Laos on Feb. 26 agreed to boost mutual cooperation in economy, trade, investment and other fields.
					On the same day Iran and Lebanon agreed to expand bilateral cooperative relations in the defense field.

articles.title: Comandancia Suprema del EPC advierte al traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Comandancia Suprema del EPC advierte al traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak volvio a cometer tremendos crimenes nunca tolerables contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 2 la siguiente declaracion: 
					Ahora llegan al climax la indignacion y el revanchismo de nuestro ejercito y pueblo por los ejercicios de guerra que la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak y los bandidescos imperialistas norteamericanos libran intencionalmente en el periodo de gran duelo nacional. 
					
					En estos tiempos criticos, la banda de Lee Myung Bak vuelve a cometer sin escrupulos imperdonables y tremendos crimenes de traicion. 
					
					Especificamente, en las unidades del ejercito titere surcoreano estan calumniando e insultando abiertamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC como si fuera poco tal situacion a punto de desatar la guerra.
					
					A citar ejemplos, en el grupo de asuntos internos de una unidad militar titere estacionada en la ciudad de Inchon estan colgados al descuido en las paredes y puertas los retratos de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu y escritas en sus bordes unas palabras tan malas que dan pena repetir. 
					
					Tal difamacion a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC es una histeria antinacional que puede cometer solo la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak y una nueva provocacion sin precedente de los gangsteres brutos que llevan a la fase irremediable la situacion del pais. 
					
					Se torna cada dia mas grave la escalada de tales casos, a saber, el de "tomar como blanco la bandera nacional de la RPDC" ocurrido sucesivamente en las unidades terrestres, navales y aereas del ejercito titere, el de "consignas y pancartas" de la misma materia colocados en los cuarteles, puestos e instalaciones militares, y el de "tomar como blanco de tiro la maxima dignidad de la RPDC" reportado en los campos de tiro y entrenamiento.
					
					Los crimenes cometidos durante gran duelo nacional constituyeron la peor maldad que insulto mas gravemente nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					La gravedad del caso reside en que el traidor Lee es autor intelectual de tales provocaciones y el ministro titere de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin y el jefe titere de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor, Jong Sung Jo, y otros belicistas militares las ejecutan como una "tarea de politica nacional".
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo se ven obligados a considerar como una provocacion extremada nunca perdonable tal locura antinacional y de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC cometida por la banda de Lee cuando se crea en la Peninsula Coreana una situacion a punto de explosion de guerra debido a los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					
					Informados de esa barbaridad, los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu esperan con ansia la orden alzando las voces de indignacion, tales como "Matemos a golpes a Myung Bak" y "Aniquilemos a los belicistas surcoreanos".
					
					Tambien en la sociedad surcoreana denuncian el presente caso como "acto imprudente que horroriza a todo el mundo", "complot de enfrentamiento fratricida de caracter primitivo" y "proceder de locos para repetir la guerra". 
					
					En representacion de la indignacion vehemente y animo de venganza de todos nuestros militares y civiles y la opinion publica de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea, la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea vuelve a declarar con solemnidad a todo el mundo que desarrollara, como ha anunciado ya al interior y exterior del pais, una sagrada e indiscriminada guerra a nuestro estilo para enterrar a la banda de traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak es el enemigo jurado con que no podemos convivir bajo el mismo cielo y los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano son la horda de traidores a que debemos aniquilar con las armas.  
					
					La sagrada guerra al estilo nuestro, fundamentada en los ataques fisicos, no parara hasta que la banda de traidores surcoreanos elimine sin dejar rastros todas las practicas de difamacion de la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, ejecute en nombre de la nacion a todos los responsables, incluyendo el traidor Lee Myung Bak y los belicistas de la capa militar, y pida disculpas ante la nacion sobre sus tremendos crimenes de traicion.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo consideran la maxima dignidad como la dignidad y honor comunes de la nacion apreciandola mas que su vida y destruiran implacablemente a quienquiera que se atreva a insultarla o desprestigiarla aun en lo minimo.
					
					Si bien han sido muy complicadas las relaciones intercoreanas en el pasado, nunca se han creado como ahora el estado de extremado enfrentamiento y gran peligro de guerra, de lo cual es totalmente responsable la camarilla de Lee.
					
					La escalada de la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida lanzada por la banda surcoreana hace imaginar al perro rabioso que acomete mas tenazmente cada vez que se le acerque la muerte.
					
					Los fusiles de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, dispuestos a tomar la venganza despiadada, exterminaran consecuentemente a los traidores surcoreanos para que estos no vuelvan a insultar nunca mas nuestra maxima dignidad ni difamar nuestro digno regimen.
					
					El mundo vera cuan tragico sera el fin de los provocadores de pesima calana en la sagrada guerra de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que se han levantado para defender a riesgo de vida a su Lider y su regimen.
					
					Quienes se atrevan a ofender, aunque fuese a la ligera, nuestra maxima dignidad, no tendran refugio en este mundo.

articles.title: Militares coreanos deciden aniquilar a banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Militares coreanos deciden aniquilar a banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- La abierta difamacion e insulto a la dignidad suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cometidos otra vez por la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea causan gran indignacion de los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Citado por la ACNC, el oficial del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Hung Ryong, (58 anos de edad) expreso su irrestricto apoyo a la declaracion fechada 2 del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC y anadio:
					
					Es el enemigo jurado la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que no satisfecha de sus ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC, se atrevio a colocar en las paredes y puertas de las unidades del ejercito titere los retratos de los Grandes Hombres simpares del monte Paektu con letras insultantes.
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados de nuestra unidad estan dispuestos a aniquilar a todos los traidores.
					
					Me parece que ya basta nuestra advertencia.
					
					Esperamos solo la orden de combate.
					
					Ryu Su Hyang (25 anos de edad), oficial del EPC, dijo:
					
					El siniestro alboroto de enfrentamiento antinacional y anti-RPDC de la banda de traidores es la declaracion de guerra que viola la paz y acarrea la guerra.
					
					Por eso, me parece que se dara la orden de avance hacia el Sur de Corea. Entonces aniquilaremos en nombre de toda la nacion coreana al traidor Lee Myung Bak y los belicistas de la capa militar.
					
					Kim Myong Chan (33 anos de edad), oficial del EPC, senalo:
					
					La historia nunca nos perdonara si no castigamos severamente al traidor Lee Myung Bak al ministro titere de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin, al jefe de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere Jong Sung Jo, y otros compinches, que inventaron tal tremendo crimen y lo presentaron como "tarea de politica nacional”.
					
					Tambien ajusticiaremos a los tipejos del grupo de asuntos internos de la unidad del ejercito titere estacionada en la ciudad de Inchon aunque estos nos pidan disculpas y se riendan.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia conducta belicosa de Kim Kwan Jin
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia conducta belicosa de Kim Kwan Jin
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el ministro de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea, Kim Kwan Jin, connotado maniaco de enfrentamiento, comete acciones belicosas en su recorrido por las unidades del ejercito titere surcoreano, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia primero la informacion no. 991. 
					El texto va como sigue: 
					
					Para "revisar en el terreno la disposicion de defensa" y otros propositos, Kim Kwan Jin inspecciono hace poco la comandancia del primer cuerpo, la aviacion de combate no. 18, la primera flota de la marina y otras unidades insistiendo en la "posibilidad de provocaciones por parte del Norte" e insultando hasta la dignidad y el sistema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Con anterioridad, durante los ejercicios de artilleria en los alrededores de las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong, aparecio en la sala de mando de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor y ordeno responder en el acto a la "provocacion" de alguien, sea cual fuera la causa. 
					
					Esta conducta de ese tipejo colmado de hostilidad a la RPDC es un insulto nunca tolerable y desafio frontal a la RPDC. 
					
					Kim Kwan Jin es el belicista pronorteamericano y traidor a la nacion que se hizo partidario y ejecutor activo de la campana de guerra contra la RPDC lanzada por su amo norteamericano y de la politica conflictiva con esta de las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					Las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas resultaron rotas y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta a punto de guerra, debido al traidor Lee Myung Bak, enloquecido por el servilismo proyanqui, la confrontacion fratricida y las maniobras belicas anti-RPDC, y a los maniacos de guerra y los lacayos de las fuerzas extranjeras tales como Kim Kwan Jin. 
					
					Ahora la banda de traidores surcoreanos se entrega a las maniobras de guerra de agresion contra la PRDC calumniandola perversamente, pero esto no pasa de ser esfuerzos agonicos de los que temen al poderio del Songun de la RPDC y estan condenados a la muerte por el pueblo por sus crimenes antinacionales. 
					
					Los militares y civiles de la RPDC no perdonaran jamas a los maniacos de guerra como el traidor Lee Myung Bak y Kim Kwan Jin y los castigaran a cualquier precio.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a Lee Myung Bak de peor maniaco de guerra
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a Lee Myung Bak de peor maniaco de guerra
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Lee Myung Bak dijo que la "reforma de defensa nacional es la tarea apremiante para reforzar la combatividad" pretextando que el "Norte sigue aumentando las fuerzas armadas". 
					E insistio en la necesidad de "hacer preparativos para vencer en la guerra", "tomar la voluntad de pasar a la represalia sobre la provocacion" y "mantener la disposicion perfecta". 
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este viernes, califica la nueva acusacion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de una sofisteria para evadir la responsabilidad por la agravacion de la tension y por la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas y justificar las maniobras belicas contra la RPDC, y prosigue: 
					
					La "seguridad" y la "represalia" de que habla el traidor Lee revelan claramente su malsana intencion y atributo belicoso. 
					
					Los que hacen inestable la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana son precisamente los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak, que se encuentra en la irremediable crisis de dominacion, pretende crear la hostilidad a la connacional RPDC y distraer la atencion de opinion publica abogando tanto por la "seguridad", pero este metodo no saldra con la suya. 
					
					La "represalia" instruida por Lee a sus esbirros demuestra claramente que el es belicista de pesima calana que instiga a la capa militar surcoreana al enfrentamiento y guerra contra la RPDC. 
					
					No hay otro remedio que ajustar la cuenta final con la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak, esto es la conclusion final que ha sacado la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras anti-Chongryon de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras anti-Chongryon de Japon
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 28 de febrero, la autoridad de seguridad publica de Japon lanzo sucesivamente a los policias armados en pesquisar de modo forzoso la Asociacion de Cientificos y Tecnicos Coreanos residentes en Japon y la Federacion de Atletas Coreanos Residentes en Japon, radicadas en la Casa de Publicacion de Corea de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), asi como la agencia de turismo, que facilita la visita a su patria de los coreanos residentes en Japon y la sucursal de la Chongryon en Itabashi de la metropoli de Tokio.
					El presente incidente, al igual que los anteriores, es una atrocidad ilegal de los reaccionarios japoneses destinada a manchar la dignidad de la RPDC y exterminar la Chongryon.
					
					Asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 2 y continua:
					
					Se inventaron innumerables artimanas de los reaccionarios japoneses a fin de exterminar la Chongryon despues de su fundacion. Pero nunca habia el caso tan pueril e infame como el presente.
					
					Esto demuestra nitidamente a que grado llego la hostilidad y la locura fascista anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon de los reaccionarios derechistas de Japon. Esta vez se ha revelado una vez mas el verdadero aspecto de este pais isleno como estado gangster donde renace el militarismo y se predomina el chovinismo nacional y como pais violador de DDHH mas sucio en el mundo.
					
					La mayor peligrosidad reside en que las campanas de los reaccionarios japoneses anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon se realizan coincidiendo con las campanas conflictivas anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Por mas que los reaccionarios japoneses actuen con frenesi no podran atentar contra la RPDC y la Chongryon que avanzan victoriosas hacia adelante con la bandera de Songun en alto.
